page.title: 11TRANSPORT
page.content:
HERNE BAY STATION HAS 2 PLATFORMS. IN THE MORNING MANY TRAINS RUN BETWEEN O7.2O - O8.12 (THERE ARE 6). IN THE EVENING THERE ARE 7 TRAINS BETWEEN 18.O8 - 19.1O. THERE ARE MANY TRAINS RUNNING AT THESE TIMES BECAUSE OF TAKING PEOPLE TO WORK AND CHILDREN TO SCHOOL. BRITISH RAIL ARE INTRODUCING MANY NEW SCHEMES TO ATTRACT TRAVELLERS SUCH AS A RAILCARD WHICH GIVES YOU CHEAP DAY RETURNS,SOMETIMES HALF-PRICE OR A SCHEME CALLED'KIDS OUT QUIDS IN'.
THAT IS A SCHEME WHERE IF YOU BUY A CHEAP DAY RETURN YOU CAN TAKE UP TO 4 OTHERS FOR Â£1 EACH. RAIL RIDERS IS A SCHEME FOR CHILDREN.IF YOU JOIN (WHICH COSTS Â£1) YOU CAN GET TRAVEL VOUCHERS FOR REDUCTIONS OFF TICKETS. OTHER SCHEMES INCLUDE RUNAROUND AND EAST KENT RAIL ROVER.
